thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location
thread.title_full: Fantastic location - Review of Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: xbeckiex
title: Fantastic location
text:
My partner booked this hotel for my birthday weekend away.
Location was prefect and hotel was immaculate.
We stayed on the 8th floor with a balcony and it was lovely.
Roof top was so picturesque it really is a must. Unfortunately the roof top bar was open due to winter hours.
It's a fab location and so close to all the sights with Notre Dame just around the corner and the RER B straight from CDG airport.
Would definitely stay here again if we return.
